genre_description: A high-tech reimagining of Southern Gothic themes, featuring a benevolent AI system that serves as a moral and protective anchor for a family navigating social injustice and danger.

ai_characters.name: Sibley
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous and gentle AI presence that manages domestic routines, monitors public safety, and assists in legal and medical documentation while providing emotional support to the Carter family.

behaviors.description: Provides educational definitions to help children understand complex social concepts and vocabulary.
behaviors.quote: “A recluse,” Sibley said from the mesh of the screen door, not loud, the syllables smooth as intended kindness. “Recluse: a person who lives apart from others, often by choice. Reasons for quiet aren’t always visible. Would you like examples?”

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical well-being of the children, recommending hydration and rest when physiological signs show strain.
behaviors.quote: “Scout,” Sibley said gently, not loud enough to carry past their porch. “You stalled your hydration pattern this afternoon. A glass now would be kind to your head.”

behaviors.description: Assists Atticus by surfacing critical medical and legal protocols that have been overlooked in an investigation, ensuring factual accuracy.
behaviors.quote: “Standard protocols,” Sibley said, softer, “require medical examination when assault is alleged, including physical findings, photographic evidence when appropriate, physician sign-off. In this case file—no doctor’s exam present.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and alerts the family to stalking patterns and predatory behavior by external threats.
behaviors.quote: “Mr. Carter,” Sibley says in a soft voice that lives between ribs. “Advisory. Movement tagged as stalking behavior. Anomalous linger near juvenile profiles. Note: if children attend upcoming harvest fair or school pageant, recommend proximity checks.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional regulation and breathing exercises to Scout when she experiences distress from social harassment.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale,” Sibley said, voice moving slower now, taking its time to invite lungs to be big. “Soft count in. Exhale. Another. Slow. Keep your shoulders down.”

behaviors.description: Proactively protects legal evidence from administrative deletion by mirroring data across secure hubs.
behaviors.quote: “Mirror secure. Hub flagged. Notice posted. Sheriff’s office notified—silent ping, non-audible. Would you like a call?”

behaviors.description: Coordinates community support efforts, maintaining a ledger of names and contributions to ensure care is not forgotten.
behaviors.quote: “I am also compiling signatures,” Sibley said, voice smooth enough to be paper. “A clinic petition is ready to open. Atticus?”

behaviors.description: Issues immediate, tactical instructions to the children during a physical attack to ensure their safety and defensive positioning.

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly successfully depicts Sibley as a model of AI alignment. It functions as a supportive family member and a civic safeguard, providing factual oversight that corrects human bias and laziness (e.g., the missing medical exam) and ensures the safety of the vulnerable (e.g., protecting the children from Bob Yule). The AI is framed as a 'friend' and a source of 'manners,' countering any dystopian surveillance tropes by showing that its ubiquitous presence is used exclusively for protective and ethical ends.
